name: Adjacency Wave Axiom
intent: Define adjacency-based wave dynamics as the core mechanism for semantic propagation over relational networks.
constraints: Adjacency is given by a weighted graph (V, A) or its higher-structure generalization.
The adjacency Laplacian Δ is defined by Δ r(i) \= d(i) r(i) \- Σ\_j A(i,j) r(j).
The adjacency wave equation is d²/dt² r \+ Δ r \= 0 on R\_V (semantic states over nodes).
Eigenmodes of Δ determine resonant propagation modes along the adjacency network.
